content:
{
  "main": "node_modules/expo/AppEntry.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "expo start",
    "android": "expo start --android",
    "ios": "expo start --ios",
    "web": "expo start --web",
    "eject": "expo eject",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@aws-amplify/api": "^2.1.6",
    "@aws-amplify/pubsub": "^2.1.7",
    "@draftbit/ui": "^2.39.1-16",
    "@react-native-community/masked-view": "^0.1.6",
    "@react-native-community/netinfo": "^5.5.1",
    "aws-amplify": "^2.2.6",
    "axios": "^0.19.2",
    "expo": "~36.0.0",
    "expo-av": "^8.0.0",
    "expo-image-picker": "^8.0.2",
    "expo-permissions": "^8.0.0",
    "react": "~16.9.0",
    "react-dom": "~16.9.0",
    "react-native": "https://github.com/expo/react-native/archive/sdk-36.0.0.tar.gz",
    "react-native-dialog": "^5.6.0",
    "react-native-elements": "^1.2.7",
    "react-native-modal": "^11.5.4",
    "react-native-picker-select": "^6.6.0",
    "react-native-ratings": "^6.5.0",
    "react-native-safe-area-context": "^0.7.3",
    "react-native-screens": "^2.0.0-beta.10",
    "react-native-web": "~0.11.7",
    "react-navigation": "^4.1.1",
    "react-navigation-stack": "^2.1.1",
    "react-navigation-tabs": "^2.8.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.1.0",
    "babel-preset-expo": "~8.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^6.8.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.18.3",
    "jest": "^25.1.0",
    "jest-expo": "^36.0.1",
    "prettier": "^1.19.1",
    "react-test-renderer": "^16.13.0"
  },
  "jest": {
    "preset": "jest-expo",
    "transformIgnorePatterns": [
      "node_modules/(?!(jest-)?react-native|react-clone-referenced-element|@react-native-community|expo(nent)?|@expo(nent)?/.*|react-navigation|@react-navigation/.*|@unimodules/.*|unimodules|sentry-expo|native-base|@draftbit/*)"
    ]
  },
  "private": true
}
name: package.json
